text: is a Japanese actress, formerly a child actress, and tarento from Saitama Prefecture affiliated with Amuse, Inc. Kanno graduated from Hosei University Faculty of Sustainability Studies.http://www.hosei.ac.jp/ningenkankyo/shokai/interview/index.html ==Filmography== ===Films=== {| class="wikitable" ! Year !!
